resources:
Write Down Your Seed Phrase" This is your seed phrase. Write it down on a paper and keep it in a safe place. You\'ll be asked to re-enter this phrase (in order) on the next step. Confirm Seed Phrase" Select each word in the order it was\n presented to you Success!" You\'ve successfully protected your wallet. Remember to keep your seed phrase safe, it\'s your responsibility! We cannot recover your wallet if you lose access. Please ensure your seed phrase is securely stored, as it cannot be retrieved through this app
Import Next
